Description:
MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS AND QUALIFICATIONSDiploma holder or higher qualification in Welding, Piping/ Mechanical– bachelor’s degree holder preferred
Have knowledge in welding inspection and fabrication of modular, piping and vessels to international codes (ASME, AWS) would be beneficial.
Have experience and thorough knowledge of codes such as ANSI B31.3, 31.4 and 31.8, ASME section I, and other piping system installation related codes and standards.
Lead the Contractor QC Inspectors
10 years of experience in Construction on industrial gases, oil & gas or related industry projects which should be construction site based.
Strong communicator written and oral
Organised, disciplined, able to perform under pressure and manage multiple priorities and parallel tasks
Strong Microsoft software skills, particularly Excel
Report writing skills
Experience of working in a multicultural project team
Middle East project experience.Job Details
